alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 11:58PM CDT until April 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern White County in central Arkansas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1157 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hurricane Lake WMA, or 9 miles southwest of Augusta, moving east at 30 mph. THis storm has a history of producing up to ping pong ball sized hail, most recently near the city of Searcy. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Augusta... Bald Knob... Patterson... West Point... Hunter... McCrory... Pryor... Hurricane Lake WMA... Becton... Dixie... Howell... Penrose... McClelland... Gregory... Grays... Pumpkin Bend... Worden... Morton... Hilleman... Wiville... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 55 and 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
